Main pronunciation 主要发音: chèn

Other pronunciations 其它发音: zhēn,chèn,chén,niǎn,zhěn

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) to chase.

English senses 英语理解: take advantage of, avail oneself

Usage example 用法举例: 趁机 chèn jī (seize the opportunity)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 2113

Shuowen 说文解字: 𧾍也從走㐱聲讀若塵

趂字的基本解释

趂
chèn
古同“趁”。

趂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chèn］
［《廣韻》丑刃切，去震，徹。］
亦作“趂1”。
(1)追逐；追赶。
(2)驱逐；驱迫。
(3)赶赴；奔赴。
(4)指快步行走。
(5)追求；寻取。
(6)随着；沿着。
(7)凑和；顺着。
(8)乘便；乘机。
(9)指凭借；依靠。
(10)乘坐；搭乘。
(11)面对；面临。
(12)挣；赚。
(13)方言。拥有。
(14)通“稱”。满足；相副。
(15)通“襯”。衬垫。
(16)通“襯”。陪衬；衬托。

趂字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【走字部】　趂； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1216第02
【玉篇】同趁。【杜甫·催宗文樹雞柵詩】驅趂制不禁。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chèn］
["Guangyun" ugly blade cut, shake, thoroughly. ]
Also called "Take advantage 1".
(1) Chase; chase.
(2) To expel; to expel.
(3) Rush; rush.
(4) Refers to walking quickly.
(5) Pursuit; seeking.
(6) Following; along.
(7) Make up; follow along.
(8) Take convenience; take the opportunity.
(9) Refers to relying on; relying on.
(10) Take a ride; take a ride.
(11) Face; face.
(12) Earn; Earn.
(13) Dialects. have.
(14) Commonly "weighed". Meet;
(15) Through "lining". liner.
(16) Through "lining". Foil.
take advantage of

[Unitary Collection] [Zhu Zi Department] 　 Chan; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1216 No. 02
【Jade articles】Take advantage of the same. [Du Fu·Cui Zong Wenshu Chicken Poem] I couldn't help but take advantage of it.
